00117 BOOLEAN gfNorthValid, gfEastValid, gfSouthValid, gfWestValid;
00118 BOOLEAN gfChangedEntrySide = FALSE;
00119 
00120 void FindValidInsertionCode( UINT8 *pubStrategicInsertionCode )
00121 {
00122       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo == -1 &&
00123                   gMapInformation.sEastGridNo == -1 &&
00124                   gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo == -1 &&
00125                   gMapInformation.sWestGridNo == -1 )
00126       {
00127             AssertMsg( 0, "Map has no entry points at all.  Can't generate edge points.  LC:1" );
00128       }
00129       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo    != -1 && !gps1stNorthEdgepointArray || 
00130                   gMapInformation.sEastGridNo         != -1 && !gps1stEastEdgepointArray        || 
00131                   gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo  != -1 && !gps1stSouthEdgepointArray || 
00132                   gMapInformation.sWestGridNo         != -1 && !gps1stWestEdgepointArray         )
00133       {
00134             InvalidateScreen();
00135             DrawTextToScreen( L"Map doesn't has entrypoints without corresponding edgepoints. LC:1",
00136                   iOffsetHorizontal + 30, iOffsetVertical + 150, 600, FONT10ARIALBOLD, FONT_RED, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );
00137             DrawTextToScreen( L"GENERATING MAP EDGEPOINTS!  Please wait...",
00138                   iOffsetHorizontal + 30, iOffsetVertical + 160, 600, FONT10ARIALBOLD, FONT_YELLOW, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED     );
00139                   
00140             RefreshScreen( NULL );
00141             GenerateMapEdgepoints();
00142             switch( *pubStrategicInsertionCode )
00143             {
00144                   case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    
00145                         if( !gps1stNorthEdgepointArray )
00146                               AssertMsg( 0, "Map Edgepoint generation failed.  KM : 0 -- send map" );
00147                         break;
00148                   case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
00149                         if( !gps1stEastEdgepointArray )
00150                               AssertMsg( 0, "Map Edgepoint generation failed.  KM : 0 -- send map" );
00151                         break;
00152                   case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    
00153                         if( !gps1stSouthEdgepointArray )
00154                               AssertMsg( 0, "Map Edgepoint generation failed.  KM : 0 -- send map" );
00155                         break;
00156                   case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:           
00157                         if( !gps1stWestEdgepointArray )
00158                               AssertMsg( 0, "Map Edgepoint generation failed.  KM : 0 -- send map" );
00159                         break;
00160             }
00161             return;
00162       }
00163       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
00164       {
00165             *pubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
00166             gfChangedEntrySide = TRUE;
00167       }
00168       else if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
00169       {
00170             *pubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
00171             gfChangedEntrySide = TRUE;
00172       }
00173       else if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
00174       {
00175             *pubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
00176             gfChangedEntrySide = TRUE;
00177       }
00178       else if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00179       {
00180             *pubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
00181             gfChangedEntrySide = TRUE;
00182       }
00183       else
00184       {
00185             AssertMsg( 0, "No maps edgepoints at all! KM, LC : 1" );
00186       }
00187 }
00188 
00189 void CheckForValidMapEdge( UINT8 *pubStrategicInsertionCode )
00190 {
00191       switch( *pubStrategicInsertionCode )
00192       {
00193             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    
00194                   if( !gps1stNorthEdgepointArray )
00195                         FindValidInsertionCode( pubStrategicInsertionCode );
00196                   break;
00197             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
00198                   if( !gps1stEastEdgepointArray )
00199                         FindValidInsertionCode( pubStrategicInsertionCode );
00200                   break;
00201             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    
00202                   if( !gps1stSouthEdgepointArray )
00203                         FindValidInsertionCode( pubStrategicInsertionCode );
00204                   break;
00205             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:           
00206                   if( !gps1stWestEdgepointArray )
00207                         FindValidInsertionCode( pubStrategicInsertionCode );
00208                   break;
00209       }
00210 }

00212 #endif

00215 void InitTacticalPlacementGUI()
00216 {
00217       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
00218       INT32 i, xp, yp;
00219       UINT8 ubFaceIndex;
00220       gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive = TRUE;
00221       gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
00222       gfValidLocationsChanged = TRUE;
00223       gfTacticalPlacementFirstTime = TRUE;
00224       gfNorth = gfEast = gfSouth = gfWest = FALSE;
00225       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00226             gfNorthValid = gfEastValid = gfSouthValid = gfWestValid = FALSE;
00227             gfChangedEntrySide = FALSE;
00228       #endif
00229 
00230       //Enter overhead map
00231       GoIntoOverheadMap();
00232 
00233       //Load the images
00234       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00235 
00236       if (iResolution == 0)
00237       {
00238       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\OverheadInterface.sti" );
00239       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giOverheadPanelImage ) )
00240       {
00241             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\OverheadInterface.sti" );
00242       }
00243       }
00244       else if (iResolution == 1)
00245       {
00246             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\OverheadInterface_800x600.sti" );
00247             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giOverheadPanelImage ) )
00248             {
00249                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\OverheadInterface_800x600.sti" );
00250             }
00251       }
00252       else if (iResolution == 2)
00253       {
00254             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\OverheadInterface_1024x768.sti" );
00255             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giOverheadPanelImage ) )
00256             {
00257                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\OverheadInterface_1024x768.sti" );
00258             }
00259       }
00260 
00261       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\panels.sti" );
00262       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giMercPanelImage ) )
00263       {
00264             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\panels.sti" );
00265       }
00266       
00267       giOverheadButtonImages[ DONE_BUTTON ] = LoadButtonImage( "Interface\\OverheadUIButtons.sti", -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00268       if( giOverheadButtonImages[ DONE_BUTTON ] == -1 )
00269       {
00270             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\OverheadUIButtons.sti" );
00271       }
00272       giOverheadButtonImages[ SPREAD_BUTTON ]         = UseLoadedButtonImage( giOverheadButtonImages[ DONE_BUTTON ], -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00273       giOverheadButtonImages[ GROUP_BUTTON ]          = UseLoadedButtonImage( giOverheadButtonImages[ DONE_BUTTON ], -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00274       giOverheadButtonImages[ CLEAR_BUTTON ]          = UseLoadedButtonImage( giOverheadButtonImages[ DONE_BUTTON ], -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00275 
00276       //Create the buttons which provide automatic placements.
00277       iTPButtons[ CLEAR_BUTTON ] = 
00278             QuickCreateButton( giOverheadButtonImages[ CLEAR_BUTTON ], 11, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 148, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00279             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ClearPlacementsCallback );
00280       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iTPButtons[ CLEAR_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_CLEAR ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00281       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTPButtons[ CLEAR_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_CLEARHELP ] );
00282       SetBtnHelpEndCallback( iTPButtons[ CLEAR_BUTTON ], FastHelpRemoved2Callback );
00283       iTPButtons[ SPREAD_BUTTON ] = 
00284             QuickCreateButton( giOverheadButtonImages[ SPREAD_BUTTON ], 11, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 113, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00285             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, SpreadPlacementsCallback );
00286       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iTPButtons[ SPREAD_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_SPREAD ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00287       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTPButtons[ SPREAD_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_SPREADHELP ] );
00288       SetBtnHelpEndCallback( iTPButtons[ SPREAD_BUTTON ], FastHelpRemovedCallback );
00289       iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] = 
00290             QuickCreateButton( giOverheadButtonImages[ GROUP_BUTTON ], 11, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 78, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00291             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, GroupPlacementsCallback );
00292       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_GROUP ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00293       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_GROUPHELP ] );
00294       SetBtnHelpEndCallback( iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ], FastHelpRemovedCallback );
00295       iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ] = 
00296             QuickCreateButton( giOverheadButtonImages[ DONE_BUTTON ], 11, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 43, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00297             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, DoneOverheadPlacementClickCallback );
00298       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_DONE ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00299       SetButtonFastHelpText( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_DONEHELP ] );
00300       SetBtnHelpEndCallback( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], FastHelpRemovedCallback );
00301       AllowDisabledButtonFastHelp( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], TRUE );
00302 
00303       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iTPButtons[ CLEAR_BUTTON ], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00304       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iTPButtons[ SPREAD_BUTTON ], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00305       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00306       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00307 
00308       //First pass:  Count the number of mercs that are going to be placed by the player.
00309       //             This determines the size of the array we will allocate.
00310       giPlacements = 0;
00311       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00312       {
00313 
00314             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && !MercPtrs[ i ]->fBetweenSectors && 
00315                         MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorX == gpBattleGroup->ubSectorX &&
00316                         MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorY == gpBattleGroup->ubSectorY   && 
00317                         !( MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) && // ATE Ignore vehicles
00318                         MercPtrs[ i ]->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW &&
00319                         MercPtrs[ i ]->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT &&
00320                         !MercPtrs[ i ]->bSectorZ )
00321             {
00322                   giPlacements++;
00323             }
00324       }
00325       //Allocate the array based on how many mercs there are.
00326       gMercPlacement = (MERCPLACEMENT*)MemAlloc( sizeof( MERCPLACEMENT ) * giPlacements );
00327       Assert( gMercPlacement );
00328       //Second pass:  Assign the mercs to their respective slots.
00329       giPlacements = 0;
00330       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00331       {
00332             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !MercPtrs[ i ]->fBetweenSectors && 
00333                         MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorX == gpBattleGroup->ubSectorX &&
00334                         MercPtrs[ i ]->sSectorY == gpBattleGroup->ubSectorY   && 
00335                         MercPtrs[ i ]->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW &&
00336                         MercPtrs[ i ]->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT &&
00337                         !( MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) && // ATE Ignore vehicles
00338                         !MercPtrs[ i ]->bSectorZ )
00339             {
00340 
00341                   // ATE: If we are in a vehicle - remove ourselves from it!
00342                   //if ( MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) )
00343                   //{
00344                   //    RemoveSoldierFromVehicle( MercPtrs[ i ], MercPtrs[ i ]->bVehicleID );
00345                   //}
00346 
00347                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX ||
00348                               MercPtrs[ i ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_SECONDARY_EDGEINDEX )
00349                   {
00350                         MercPtrs[ i ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode = (UINT8)MercPtrs[ i ]->usStrategicInsertionData;
00351                   }
00352                   gMercPlacement[ giPlacements ].pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
00353                   gMercPlacement[ giPlacements ].ubStrategicInsertionCode = MercPtrs[ i ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode;
00354                   gMercPlacement[ giPlacements ].fPlaced = FALSE;
00355                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00356                         CheckForValidMapEdge( &MercPtrs[ i ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode );
00357                   #endif
00358                   switch( MercPtrs[ i ]->ubStrategicInsertionCode )
00359                   {
00360                         case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    
00361                               gfNorth = TRUE;
00362                               break;
00363                         case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:           
00364                               gfEast      = TRUE;           
00365                               break;
00366                         case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    
00367                               gfSouth = TRUE;         
00368                               break;
00369                         case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:           
00370                               gfWest      = TRUE;           
00371                               break;
00372                   }
00373                   giPlacements++;
00374             }
00375       }
00376       //add all the faces now
00377       for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00378       {
00379             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00380 
00381             //Load the faces
00382             {
00383                   ubFaceIndex = gMercProfiles[ gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex;
00384                   if( ubFaceIndex < 100 )
00385                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%02d.sti", ubFaceIndex );
00386                   else
00387                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%03d.sti", ubFaceIndex );
00388             }
00389 
00390             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &gMercPlacement[ i ].uiVObjectID ) )
00391             {
00392                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\speck.sti" );
00393                   if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &gMercPlacement[ i ].uiVObjectID ) )
00394                   {
00395                         AssertMsg( 0, String("Failed to load %Faces\\65Face\\%03d.sti or it's placeholder, speck.sti", gMercProfiles[ gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex) );
00396                   }
00397             }
00398 
00399 
00400             xp = 91 + (i / 2) * 54;
00401 
00402             if (i % 2)
00403             {
00404                   yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 68;
00405             }
00406             else
00407             {
00408                   yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 119;
00409             }
00410 
00411             //yp = (i % 2) ? 412 : 361;
00412             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMercPlacement[ i ].region, (UINT16)xp, (UINT16)yp, (UINT16)(xp + 54), (UINT16)(yp + 62), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, 0, MercMoveCallback, MercClickCallback );
00413       }
00414       
00415       PlaceMercs();
00416 
00417       if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
00418       {
00419             ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00420             for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00421             { //go from the currently selected soldier to the end
00422                   if( !gMercPlacement[ i ].fPlaced )
00423                   { //Found an unplaced merc.  Select him.
00424                         gbSelectedMercID = (INT8)i;
00425                         if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
00426                               gubSelectedGroupID = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID;
00427                         gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
00428                         SetCursorMerc( (INT8)i );
00429                         gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
00430                         break;
00431                   }
00432             }
00433       }
00434 }
00435 
00436 void RenderTacticalPlacementGUI()
00437 {
00438       INT32 i, xp, yp, width, height;
00439       INT32 iStartY;
00440       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00441       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00442       UINT16 usHatchColor;
00443       UINT16 str[ 128 ];
00444       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00445       UINT8 ubColor;
00446 
00447       if( gfTacticalPlacementFirstTime )
00448       {
00449             gfTacticalPlacementFirstTime = FALSE;
00450             DisableScrollMessages();
00451       }
00452       //Check to make sure that if we have a hilighted merc (not selected) and the mouse has moved out
00453       //of it's region, then we will clear the hilighted ID, and refresh the display.
00454       if( !gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty && gbHilightedMercID != -1 )
00455       {
00456             xp = 91 + (gbHilightedMercID / 2) * 54;
00457 
00458             if (gbHilightedMercID % 2)
00459             {
00460                   yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 68;
00461             }
00462             else
00463             {
00464                   yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 119;
00465             }
00466 
00467             //yp = (gbHilightedMercID % 2) ? 412 : 361;
00468             
00469             if( gusMouseXPos < xp || gusMouseXPos > xp + 54 || gusMouseYPos < yp || gusMouseYPos > yp + 62 )
00470             {
00471                   gbHilightedMercID = -1;
00472                   gubHilightedGroupID = 0;
00473                   SetCursorMerc( gbSelectedMercID );
00474                   gpTacticalPlacementHilightedSoldier = NULL;
00475             }
00476       }
00477       //If the display is dirty render the entire panel.
00478       if( gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty )
00479       {
00480             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, giOverheadPanelImage, 0, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 160, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
00481             InvalidateRegion( 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 160, 320, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00482             gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = FALSE;
00483             MarkButtonsDirty();
00484             //DisableHilightsAndHelpText();
00485             //RenderButtons();
00486             //EnableHilightsAndHelpText();
00487             for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00488             { //Render the mercs
00489                   pSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
00490 
00491 
00492                   xp = 95 + (i / 2) * 54;
00493 
00494                   if (i % 2)
00495                   {
00496                         yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 58;
00497                   }
00498                   else
00499                   {
00500                         yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 109;
00501                   }
00502                   
00503                   //yp = (i % 2) ? 422 : 371;
00504 
00505                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+36, yp+2, xp+44,      yp+30, 0 );
00506                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, giMercPanelImage, 0, xp, yp, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00507                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gMercPlacement[ i ].uiVObjectID, 0, xp+2, yp+2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00508                   //HEALTH BAR
00509                   if( !pSoldier->bLife )
00510                         continue;
00511                   //yellow one for bleeding
00512                   iStartY = yp + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bLifeMax/100;
00513                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+36, iStartY, xp+37, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 107, 57 ) ) );
00514                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+37, iStartY, xp+38, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 181, 115 ) ) );
00515                   //pink one for bandaged.
00516                   iStartY += 27*pSoldier->bBleeding/100;
00517                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+36, iStartY, xp+37, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 156, 57, 57 ) ) );
00518                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+37, iStartY, xp+38, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 132, 132 ) ) );
00519                   //red one for actual health
00520                   iStartY = yp + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bLife/100;
00521                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+36, iStartY, xp+37, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 8, 8 ) ) );
00522                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+37, iStartY, xp+38, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 206, 0, 0 ) ) );
00523                   //BREATH BAR
00524                   iStartY = yp + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bBreathMax/100;
00525                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+39, iStartY, xp+40, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 132 ) ) );
00526                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+40, iStartY, xp+41, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 107 ) ) );
00527                   //MORALE BAR
00528                   iStartY = yp + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bMorale/100;
00529                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+42, iStartY, xp+43, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 156, 8 ) ) );
00530                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, xp+43, iStartY, xp+44, yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 107, 8 ) ) );
00531             }
00532             SetFont( BLOCKFONT );
00533             SetFontForeground( FONT_BEIGE );
00534             SetFontShadow( 141 );
00535             
00536             GetSectorIDString( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, gubPBSectorZ, str, TRUE );
00537 
00538             mprintf(120, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 145, L"%s %s -- %s...", gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_SECTOR ], str, gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_CHOOSEENTRYPOSITIONS ] );
00539 
00540             //Shade out the part of the tactical map that isn't considered placable.
00541             BlitBufferToBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 160, SCREEN_WIDTH, 160);
00542       }
00543       if( gfValidLocationsChanged )
00544       {
00545             if( DayTime() ) 
00546             { //6AM to 9PM is black
00547                   usHatchColor = 0; //Black
00548             }
00549             else
00550             { //9PM to 6AM is gray (black is too dark to distinguish)
00551                   usHatchColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 63, 31, 31 ) ); 
00552             }
00553             gfValidLocationsChanged--;
00554             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, iOffsetHorizontal, iOffsetVertical, 640, 320 );
00555             InvalidateRegion( iOffsetHorizontal, iOffsetVertical, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00556             if( gbCursorMercID == -1 )
00557             {
00558                   // WANNE 2
00559                   gTPClipRect.iLeft = gfWest    ? iOffsetHorizontal + 30      : iOffsetHorizontal;
00560                   gTPClipRect.iTop  = gfNorth   ? iOffsetVertical + 30 + 3          : iOffsetVertical + 3;
00561                   gTPClipRect.iRight      = gfEast    ? iOffsetHorizontal + 610     : iOffsetHorizontal + 634; // 636
00562                   gTPClipRect.iBottom     = gfSouth   ? iOffsetVertical + 290 : iOffsetVertical + 320;
00563             }
00564             else
00565             {
00566                   gTPClipRect.iLeft       = iOffsetHorizontal;
00567                   gTPClipRect.iTop        = iOffsetVertical + 3;
00568                   // WANNE 2
00569                   //gTPClipRect.iRight          = iOffsetHorizontal + 640;
00570                   gTPClipRect.iRight            = iOffsetHorizontal + 634;  // 635
00571                   gTPClipRect.iBottom           = iOffsetVertical + 320;
00572                   switch( gMercPlacement[ gbCursorMercID ].ubStrategicInsertionCode )
00573                   {
00574                         case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    gTPClipRect.iTop  = iOffsetVertical + 30 + 3;               break;
00575                         case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:     gTPClipRect.iRight      = iOffsetHorizontal + 610;          break;
00576                         case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    gTPClipRect.iBottom     = iOffsetVertical + 290;            break;
00577                         case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:     gTPClipRect.iLeft = iOffsetHorizontal + 30;           break;
00578                   }
00579             }
00580             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00581             Blt16BPPBufferLooseHatchRectWithColor( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &gTPClipRect, usHatchColor );
00582             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00583             RectangleDraw( TRUE, gTPClipRect.iLeft, gTPClipRect.iTop, gTPClipRect.iRight, gTPClipRect.iBottom, usHatchColor, pDestBuf );
00584             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00585       }
00586       for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00587       { //Render the merc's names
00588             pSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
00589             
00590             xp = 95 + (i / 2) * 54;
00591 
00592             if (i % 2)
00593             {
00594                   yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 58;
00595             }
00596             else
00597             {
00598                   yp = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 109;
00599             }
00600 
00601             //yp = (i % 2) ? 422 : 371;
00602             //NAME
00603             if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON && gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID == gubSelectedGroupID ||
00604                     gubDefaultButton != GROUP_BUTTON && i == gbSelectedMercID )
00605             {
00606                   ubColor = FONT_YELLOW;
00607             }
00608             else if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON && gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID == gubHilightedGroupID ||
00609                                      gubDefaultButton != GROUP_BUTTON && i == gbHilightedMercID )
00610             {
00611                   ubColor = FONT_WHITE;
00612             }
00613             else
00614             {
00615                   ubColor = FONT_GRAY3;
00616             }
00617             SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
00618             SetFontForeground( ubColor );
00619             SetFontShadow( 141 );
00620             //Render the question mark over the face if the merc hasn't yet been placed.
00621             if( gMercPlacement[ i ].fPlaced )
00622             {
00623                   RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_SINGLE, NULL, (INT16)(xp + 16), (INT16)(yp + 14), (INT16)(xp + 24), (INT16)(yp + 22) ); 
00624             }
00625             else
00626             {
00627                   mprintf( xp + 16, yp + 14, L"?" );
00628                   InvalidateRegion( xp + 16, yp + 14, xp + 24, yp + 22 );
00629             }
00630             SetFont( BLOCKFONT );
00631             width = StringPixLength( pSoldier->name, BLOCKFONT );
00632             height = GetFontHeight( BLOCKFONT );
00633             xp = xp + ( 48 - width ) / 2;
00634             yp = yp + 33;
00635             mprintf( xp, yp, pSoldier->name );
00636             InvalidateRegion( xp, yp, xp + width, yp + width );
00637       }
00638 
00639 }
00640 
00641 void EnsureDoneButtonStatus()
00642 {
00643       INT32 i;
00644       //static BOOLEAN fInside = FALSE;
00645       //BOOLEAN fChanged = FALSE;
00646       for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00647       {
00648             if( !gMercPlacement[ i ].fPlaced ) 
00649             {
00650                   if( ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
00651                   {
00652                         DisableButton( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ] );
00653                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_DISABLED_DONEHELP ] );
00654                   }
00655                   return;
00656             }
00657       }
00658       if( !(ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) )
00659       { //only enable it when it is disabled, otherwise the button will stay down!
00660             EnableButton( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ] );
00661             SetButtonFastHelpText( iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_DONEHELP ] );
00662       }
00663 }
00664 
00665 void TacticalPlacementHandle()
00666 {
00667   InputAtom InputEvent;
00668 
00669       EnsureDoneButtonStatus();
00670 
00671       RenderTacticalPlacementGUI();
00672 
00673       if( gfRightButtonState )
00674       {
00675             gbSelectedMercID = -1;
00676             gubSelectedGroupID = 0;
00677             gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = NULL;
00678       }
00679 
00680   while( DequeueEvent( &InputEvent ) )
00681   {
00682             if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00683             {
00684                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
00685                   {
00686                         #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00687                         case ESC:
00688                               KillTacticalPlacementGUI();
00689                               break;
00690                         #endif
00691                         case ENTER:
00692                               if( ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ DONE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
00693                               {
00694                                     KillTacticalPlacementGUI();
00695                               }
00696                               break;
00697                         case 'c':
00698                               ClearPlacementsCallback( ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ CLEAR_BUTTON ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
00699                               break;
00700                         case 'g':
00701                               GroupPlacementsCallback( ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
00702                               break;
00703                         case 's':
00704                               SpreadPlacementsCallback( ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ SPREAD_BUTTON ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
00705                               break;
00706                         case 'x':
00707                               if( InputEvent.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
00708                               {
00709                                     HandleShortCutExitState();
00710                               }
00711                               break;
00712                   }
00713             }
00714       }
00715       gfValidCursor = FALSE;
00716 
00717       if( gbSelectedMercID != -1 && gusMouseYPos < (iOffsetVertical + 320) && gusMouseYPos > iOffsetVertical
00718             && gusMouseXPos > iOffsetHorizontal && gusMouseXPos < (iOffsetHorizontal + 640))
00719       {
00720             switch( gMercPlacement[ gbCursorMercID ].ubStrategicInsertionCode )
00721             {
00722                   case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:    
00723                         if( gusMouseYPos <= (iOffsetVertical + 30) )    // 40
00724                               gfValidCursor = TRUE;
00725                         break;
00726                   case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:           
00727                         if( gusMouseXPos >= (iOffsetHorizontal + 610) )   // 600
00728                               gfValidCursor = TRUE;
00729                         break;
00730                   case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:    
00731                         if( gusMouseYPos >= (iOffsetVertical + 290) )  // 280
00732                               gfValidCursor = TRUE;
00733                         break;
00734                   case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:           
00735                         if( gusMouseXPos <= (iOffsetHorizontal + 30) )  // 40
00736                               gfValidCursor = TRUE;
00737                         break;
00738             }
00739             if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
00740             {
00741                   if( gfValidCursor )
00742                   {
00743                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_PLACEGROUP );
00744                   }
00745                   else
00746                   {
00747                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_DPLACEGROUP );
00748                   }
00749             }
00750             else
00751             {
00752                   if( gfValidCursor )
00753                   {
00754                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_PLACEMERC );
00755                   }
00756                   else
00757                   {
00758                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_DPLACEMERC );
00759                   }
00760             }
00761       }
00762       else
00763       {
00764             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00765       }
00766       if( gfKillTacticalGUI == 1 )
00767       {
00768             KillTacticalPlacementGUI();
00769       }
00770       else if( gfKillTacticalGUI == 2 )
00771       {
00772             gfKillTacticalGUI = 1;
00773       }
00774 }
00775 
00776 void KillTacticalPlacementGUI()
00777 {
00778       INT32 i;
00779 
00780       gbHilightedMercID = -1;
00781       gbSelectedMercID = -1;
00782       gubSelectedGroupID = 0;
00783       gubHilightedGroupID = 0;
00784       gbCursorMercID = -1;
00785       gpTacticalPlacementHilightedSoldier = NULL;
00786       gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = NULL;
00787       
00788       //Destroy the tactical placement gui.
00789       gfEnterTacticalPlacementGUI = FALSE;
00790       gfTacticalPlacementGUIActive = FALSE;
00791       gfKillTacticalGUI = FALSE;
00792       //Delete video objects
00793       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giOverheadPanelImage );
00794       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giMercPanelImage );
00795       //Delete buttons
00796       for( i = 0; i < NUM_TP_BUTTONS; i++ )
00797       {
00798             UnloadButtonImage( giOverheadButtonImages[ i ] );
00799             RemoveButton( iTPButtons[ i ] );
00800       }
00801       //Delete faces and regions
00802       for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00803       {
00804             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gMercPlacement[ i ].uiVObjectID );
00805             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMercPlacement[ i ].region );
00806       }
00807 
00808       if( gsCurInterfacePanel < 0 || gsCurInterfacePanel >= NUM_UI_PANELS )
00809             gsCurInterfacePanel = TEAM_PANEL;
00810 
00811       SetCurrentInterfacePanel( (UINT8)gsCurInterfacePanel );
00812       
00813       //Leave the overhead map.
00814       KillOverheadMap();
00815       //Recreate the tactical panel.
00816       MSYS_EnableRegion(&gRadarRegion);
00817       SetCurrentInterfacePanel( TEAM_PANEL );
00818       //Initialize the rest of the map (AI, enemies, civs, etc.)
00819 
00820       for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00821       {
00822             PickUpMercPiece( i );   
00823       }
00824 
00825       PrepareLoadedSector();
00826       EnableScrollMessages();
00827 
00828       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00829       if( gfChangedEntrySide )
00830       {
00831             ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Substituted different entry side due to invalid entry points or map edgepoints.  KM, LC : 1" );
00832       }
00833       #endif
00834 }
00835 
00836 void ChooseRandomEdgepoints()
00837 {
00838       INT32 i;
00839       for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00840       {
00841             if ( !( gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00842             {
00843                   gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = ChooseMapEdgepoint( gMercPlacement[ i ].ubStrategicInsertionCode );
00844                   if( gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData != NOWHERE )
00845                   {
00846                         gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
00847                   }
00848                   else
00849                   {
00850                         if( gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData < 0 || gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData > WORLD_MAX )
00851                         {
00852                               i = i;
00853                         }
00854                         gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = gMercPlacement[ i ].ubStrategicInsertionCode;
00855                   }
00856             }
00857 
00858             PutDownMercPiece( i );
00859       }
00860       gfEveryonePlaced = TRUE;
00861 }
00862 
00863 void PlaceMercs()
00864 {
00865       INT32 i;
00866       switch( gubDefaultButton )
00867       {
00868             case SPREAD_BUTTON: //Place mercs randomly along their side using map edgepoints.
00869                   ChooseRandomEdgepoints();
00870                   break;
00871             case CLEAR_BUTTON:
00872                   for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00873                   {
00874                         PickUpMercPiece( i );   
00875                   }
00876                   gubSelectedGroupID = 0;
00877                   gbSelectedMercID = 0;
00878                   SetCursorMerc( 0 );
00879                   gfEveryonePlaced = FALSE;
00880                   break;
00881             default:
00882                   return;
00883       }
00884       gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
00885 }
00886 
00887 void DoneOverheadPlacementClickCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00888 {
00889       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00890       {
00891             gfKillTacticalGUI = 2;
00892       }
00893 }
00894 
00895 void SpreadPlacementsCallback ( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00896 {
00897       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00898       {
00899             gubDefaultButton = SPREAD_BUTTON;
00900             ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00901             ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00902             PlaceMercs();
00903             gubSelectedGroupID = 0;
00904             gbSelectedMercID = -1;
00905             SetCursorMerc( -1 );
00906       }
00907 }
00908 
00909 void GroupPlacementsCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00910 {
00911       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00912       {
00913             if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
00914             {
00915                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00916                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00917                   gubDefaultButton = CLEAR_BUTTON;
00918                   gubSelectedGroupID = 0;
00919             }
00920             else
00921             {
00922                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY;
00923                   gubDefaultButton = GROUP_BUTTON;
00924                   gbSelectedMercID = 0;
00925                   SetCursorMerc( gbSelectedMercID );
00926                   gubSelectedGroupID = gMercPlacement[ gbSelectedMercID ].pSoldier->ubGroupID;
00927             }
00928       }
00929 }
00930 
00931 void ClearPlacementsCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00932 {
00933       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00934       {
00935             ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00936             ButtonList[ iTPButtons[ GROUP_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00937             gubDefaultButton = CLEAR_BUTTON;
00938             PlaceMercs();
00939       }
00940 }
00941 
00942 void MercMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
00943 {
00944       if( reg->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
00945       {
00946             INT8 i;
00947             for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00948             {
00949                   if( &gMercPlacement[ i ].region == reg )
00950                   {
00951                         if( gbHilightedMercID != i )
00952                         {
00953                               gbHilightedMercID = i;
00954                               if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
00955                                     gubHilightedGroupID = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID;
00956                               SetCursorMerc( i );
00957                               gpTacticalPlacementHilightedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
00958                         }
00959                         return;
00960                   }
00961             }
00962       }
00963 }
00964 
00965 void MercClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
00966 {
00967       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00968       {
00969             INT8 i;
00970             for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00971             {
00972                   if( &gMercPlacement[ i ].region == reg )
00973                   {
00974                         if( gbSelectedMercID != i )
00975                         {
00976                               gbSelectedMercID = i;
00977                               gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
00978                               if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
00979                               {
00980                                     gubSelectedGroupID = gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier->ubGroupID;
00981                               }
00982                         }
00983                         return;
00984                   }
00985             }
00986       }
00987 }
00988 
00989 void SelectNextUnplacedUnit()
00990 {
00991       INT32 i;
00992       if( gbSelectedMercID == -1 )
00993             return;
00994       for( i = gbSelectedMercID; i < giPlacements; i++ )
00995       { //go from the currently selected soldier to the end
00996             if( !gMercPlacement[ i ].fPlaced )
00997             { //Found an unplaced merc.  Select him.
00998                   gbSelectedMercID = (INT8)i;
00999                   if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
01000                         gubSelectedGroupID = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID;
01001                   gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01002                   SetCursorMerc( (INT8)i );
01003                   gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
01004                   return;
01005             }
01006       }
01007       for( i = 0; i < gbSelectedMercID; i++ )
01008       { //go from the beginning to the currently selected soldier
01009             if( !gMercPlacement[ i ].fPlaced )
01010             { //Found an unplaced merc.  Select him.
01011                   gbSelectedMercID = (INT8)i;
01012                   if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
01013                         gubSelectedGroupID = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID;
01014                   gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01015                   SetCursorMerc( (INT8)i );
01016                   gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
01017                   return;
01018             }
01019       }
01020       //checked the whole array, and everybody has been placed.  Select nobody.
01021       if( !gfEveryonePlaced )
01022       {
01023             gfEveryonePlaced = TRUE;
01024             SetCursorMerc( -1 );
01025             gbSelectedMercID = -1;
01026             gubSelectedGroupID = 0;
01027             gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01028             gfValidLocationsChanged = TRUE;
01029             gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier;
01030       }
01031 }
01032 
01033 void HandleTacticalPlacementClicksInOverheadMap( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01034 {
01035       INT32 i;
01036       INT16 sGridNo;
01037       BOOLEAN fInvalidArea = FALSE;
01038       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01039       { //if we have a selected merc, move him to the new closest map edgepoint of his side.
01040             if( gfValidCursor )
01041             {
01042                   if( gbSelectedMercID != -1 )
01043                   {
01044                         if( GetOverheadMouseGridNo( &sGridNo ) )
01045                         { //we have clicked within a valid part of the map.
01046                               BeginMapEdgepointSearch();
01047 
01048                               if( gubDefaultButton == GROUP_BUTTON )
01049                               { //We are placing a whole group.
01050                                     for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
01051                                     { //Find locations of each member of the group, but don't place them yet.  If 
01052                                           //one of the mercs can't be placed, then we won't place any, and tell the user
01053                                           //the problem.  If everything's okay, we will place them all.
01054                                           if( gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID == gubSelectedGroupID )
01055                                           {
01056                                                 gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = SearchForClosestPrimaryMapEdgepoint( sGridNo, gMercPlacement[ i ].ubStrategicInsertionCode );
01057                                                 if( gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData == NOWHERE )
01058                                                 {
01059                                                       fInvalidArea = TRUE;
01060                                                       break;
01061                                                 }
01062                                           }
01063                                     }
01064                                     if( !fInvalidArea )
01065                                     { //One or more of the mercs in the group didn't get gridno assignments, so we
01066                                           //report an error.
01067                                           for( i = 0; i < giPlacements; i++ )
01068                                           {
01069                                                 gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01070                                                 if( gMercPlacement[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID == gubSelectedGroupID )
01071                                                 {
01072                                                       PutDownMercPiece( i );
01073                                                 }
01074                                           }
01075                                     }
01076                               }
01077                               else
01078                               { //This is a single merc placement.  If valid, then place him, else report error.
01079                                     gMercPlacement[ gbSelectedMercID ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = SearchForClosestPrimaryMapEdgepoint( sGridNo, gMercPlacement[ gbSelectedMercID ].ubStrategicInsertionCode );
01080                                     if( gMercPlacement[ gbSelectedMercID ].pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData != NOWHERE )
01081                                     {
01082                                           gMercPlacement[ gbSelectedMercID ].pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01083                                           PutDownMercPiece( gbSelectedMercID );
01084                                     }
01085                                     else
01086                                     {
01087                                           fInvalidArea = TRUE;
01088                                     }
01089 
01090                                     //gbSelectedMercID++;
01091                                     //if( gbSelectedMercID == giPlacements )
01092                                     //    gbSelectedMercID = 0;
01093                                     //gpTacticalPlacementSelectedSoldier = gMercPlacement[ gbSelectedMercID ].pSoldier;
01094                                     gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01095                                     //SetCursorMerc( gbSelectedMercID );
01096                               }
01097                               EndMapEdgepointSearch();
01098 
01099                               if( fInvalidArea )
01100                               { 
01101                                     // Only display the error message, when the cursor is on the overview map
01102                                     if (gusMouseYPos < (iOffsetVertical + 320) && gusMouseYPos > iOffsetVertical
01103                                           && gusMouseXPos > iOffsetHorizontal && gusMouseXPos < (iOffsetHorizontal + 640))
01104                                     {
01105                                           //Report error due to invalid placement.
01106                                           SGPRect CenterRect = { 100, 100, SCREEN_WIDTH - 100, 300 };
01107                                     DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_INACCESSIBLE_MESSAGE ],  guiCurrentScreen, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK | MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT, DialogRemoved,  &CenterRect );
01108                               }
01109                               }
01110                               else
01111                               { //Placement successful, so select the next unplaced unit (single or group).
01112                                     SelectNextUnplacedUnit();
01113                               }
01114                         }
01115                   }
01116             }
01117             else
01118             { //not a valid cursor location...
01119                   if( gbCursorMercID != - 1 )
01120                   {
01121                         // Only display the error message, when the cursor is on the overview map
01122                         if (gusMouseYPos < (iOffsetVertical + 320) && gusMouseYPos > iOffsetVertical
01123                               && gusMouseXPos > iOffsetHorizontal && gusMouseXPos < (iOffsetHorizontal + 640))
01124                         {                             
01125                               SGPRect CenterRect = { 100, 100, SCREEN_WIDTH - 100, 300 };
01126                         DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gpStrategicString[ STR_TP_INVALID_MESSAGE ],  guiCurrentScreen, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK | MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT, DialogRemoved,  &CenterRect );
01127                         }
01128                   }
01129             }
01130       }
01131 }
01132 
01133 void SetCursorMerc( INT8 bPlacementID )
01134 {
01135       if( gbCursorMercID != bPlacementID )
01136       {
01137             if( gbCursorMercID == -1 || bPlacementID == -1 || 
01138                     gMercPlacement[ gbCursorMercID ].ubStrategicInsertionCode != gMercPlacement[ bPlacementID ].ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01139                   gfValidLocationsChanged = TRUE;
01140             gbCursorMercID = bPlacementID;
01141       }
01142 }
01143 
01144 
01145 void PutDownMercPiece( INT32 iPlacement )
01146 {
01147       INT16 sGridNo, sCellX, sCellY;
01148       UINT8 ubDirection;
01149 
01150       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01151       pSoldier = gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].pSoldier;
01152       switch( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01153       {
01154             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
01155                   pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
01156                   break;
01157             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
01158                   pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
01159                   break;
01160             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
01161                   pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
01162                   break;
01163             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
01164                   pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
01165                   break;
01166             case INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO:
01167                   pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo = pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData;
01168                   break;
01169             default:
01170                   Assert( 0 );
01171                   break;
01172       }
01173       if( gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].fPlaced )
01174             PickUpMercPiece( iPlacement );
01175       sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, 4, &ubDirection );
01176       if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01177       {
01178             ConvertGridNoToCellXY( sGridNo, &sCellX, &sCellY );
01179             EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
01180             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
01181             pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
01182             gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].fPlaced = TRUE;
01183             gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].pSoldier->bInSector = TRUE;
01184       }
01185 }
01186 
01187 void PickUpMercPiece( INT32 iPlacement )
01188 {
01189       RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].pSoldier );
01190       gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].fPlaced = FALSE;
01191       gMercPlacement[ iPlacement ].pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
01192 }
01193 
01194 void FastHelpRemovedCallback()
01195 {
01196       gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01197 }
01198 
01199 void FastHelpRemoved2Callback()
01200 {
01201       gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01202       gfValidLocationsChanged = 2; //because fast help text covers it.
01203 }
01204 
01205 void DialogRemoved( UINT8 ubResult )
01206 {
01207       gfTacticalPlacementGUIDirty = TRUE;
01208       gfValidLocationsChanged = TRUE; 
01209 }
